TopicTitle: Breaking Ground EVA Suits Not Appearing?

Articles.Content:
I have bought Breaking Ground.  All the robotic parts and ground science things are there.  But what's not there at all are the new EVA suits.  Everybody's still wearing the same semi-old (as not the original, but the fancier, later version) white suits with no lighted trim, both the original 4 and all rescued/hired troops.  Nobody has any lighted seams, and the color hasn't changed.

I verified my installation on Steam and it said all was OK.  I've looked in both settings menus (main one outside of a game and also inside a save) and don't see anything to change regarding suit appearance.

So what's up/

59 minutes ago, Geschosskopf said:

So what's up/

You have to toggle lights on to see the seams.(Took me a bit to figure it out).

Here is how the suits look when selecting them https://imgur.com/a/kN8EFdK

Maybe thats your issue? .If not hope you figure it out  . Do you have steam cloud saving by any chance?I doubt it but maybe its messing things up?

Edited June 3, 2019 by Boyster

Did you remember to click the coathanger next to their names, as in Boyster's screenshot? Failing that, I'm not sure what the issue could be. I haven't got Breaking Ground yet, so can't really help beyond that.

5 hours ago, CommanderSmith said:

Did you remember to click the coathanger next to their names, as in Boyster's screenshot? 

That was it!  I had no idea that was a button.  I thought it was just to distinguish your employees from tourists.  But now I see there are 3 suits:  the old white one, a blue one (I'm guessing from Making History), and now this new one.  Thanks!

@Boyster:  Thanks for taking the time
